headline: Potential Warsh Exit Puts UPS Board And Dividend Priorities In Focus
summary: UPS board member Kevin M. Warsh has been nominated to serve as Chairman of the U.S. Federal Reserve. Warsh has informed United Parcel Service that he will resign from the board if he is confirmed to the role. The potential departure would alter the board composition at UPS and link the company more directly to high level economic policy discussions. For investors watching United Parcel Service (NYSE:UPS), this boardroom news comes as the stock trades around $117.34 and reflects a mix of...
